EmailTemplate.description: email alert for Survey Result workflow rule
EmailTemplate.name: Survey Completed email template
EmailTemplate.subject: Survey Completed / Review Feedback from {!Survey_Result__c.Contact__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Survey_Result__c.Contact__c} from {!Survey_Result__c.Account__c} has completed their NCR Customer Relationship Survey.
Please click this link: https://ncr.my.salesforce.com/{!Survey_Result__c.Id} to review their responses.
NOTE: You may receive additional alerts if {!Survey_Result__c.Contact__c} reported an immediate concern or was classified as a Detractor.
